attributes.action: Make Public Services & Good Causes Free to finance for the Government.
attributes.additional_details:
International Signature Collection & Blog Explaining Proposal & Petition Https://helptheworld.live 

YouTube Video
https://youtu.be/_rZRbLX6zW8

YouTube Turkish Video https://youtu.be/x_h5bU2jMZM
attributes.background: The Government doesn’t have enough due to the fact that it has to relie on taxes and borrowing to generate it’s funds. The Government should work with the Bank of England to get unlimited grants to give us free public services and good causes like increase minimum wage, pensions, health care etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
